attributes.action: exempt people aged 80 and over from ANY fuel bills
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increasing fuel bills affect us all but the most vulnerable in our society are most at risk. Fuel poverty should not exist in this country and we need to protect our older people. They have served this country well and we owe them that.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
